pages.text: Snakes usually appear in savannas, deserts and plains, where they prey on other animals, killing them with their venom.$(br2)Snakes may drop their Snake Tongue, which is commonly used in witchcraft (though it may also be acquired from some $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Demonic Entities$()).

Snakes can be $(l:bewitchment:rituals/binding)Familiars$(). Witches with a Snake $(l:bewitchment:rituals/binding)Familiar$() are able to craft much more durable $(l:bewitchment:sigils/using_sigils)Sigils$(). Additionally they benefit from poison; it does not harm them and refills their $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars#internalme)Internal ME Buffer$().
Snakes can be tamed with Raw Rabbit, and bred with Raw Chicken.
